基于Remix构建一个条码扫描网络应用
How to Build a Barcode and QR Code Scanner in Remix
The article talks about how to build a barcode and QR code scanner using Dynamsoft Barcode Reader and Remix.
本文介绍了如何使用Dynamsoft Barcode Reader和Remix构建一个条码扫描应用。使用Prisma和PostgreSQL存储扫描的图书。
The article talks about how to build a barcode and QR code scanner using Dynamsoft Barcode Reader and Remix.
Remix is a full stack web framework that lets you focus on the user interface and work back through web standards to deliver a fast, slick, and resilient user experience.
Remix是一个全栈Web框架，可以让开着专注于用户界面，并通过Web标准来提供快速、流畅和弹性的用户体验。
Remix is a full stack web framework that lets you focus on the user interface and work back through web standards to deliver a fast, slick, and resilient user experience.
It has been acquired by Shopify and is the recommended framework in React's docs.
它已被Shopify收购，也是React文档中推荐的框架。
It has been acquired by Shopify and is the recommended framework in React's docs.
In this article, we are going to build a barcode and QR code scanner using Remix.
在本文中，我们将使用Remix构建一个条码扫描应用。
In this article, we are going to build a barcode and QR code scanner using Remix.
<g1>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g1> is used to access the camera in browsers and <g2>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g2> is used to read barcodes from the camera video frames.
使用<g1>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g1>在浏览器中访问相机，<g2>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g2>从相机视频帧中读取条形码。
<g1>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g1> is used to access the camera in browsers and <g2>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g2> is used to read barcodes from the camera video frames.
To illustrate Remix's features, the demo scans the ISBN barcodes, gets the book info, and saves them to a PostgreSQL database with Prisma as the ORM.
demo能扫描ISBN条形码，获取图书信息，并使用Prisma做为ORM将它们保存到PostgreSQL数据库中。
To illustrate Remix's features, the demo scans the ISBN barcodes, gets the book info, and saves them to a PostgreSQL database with Prisma as the ORM.

从环境变量读取许可证

我们可以直接将许可证存储在代码中来使用它：
We can directly store the license in the code and use it:
But as Remix is a full-stack framework, we can store it as the system's environment variable for better flexibility.
不过既然Remix是一个全栈框架，我们可以将其存储为系统的环境变量。
But as Remix is a full-stack framework, we can store it as the system's environment variable for better flexibility.
The function tries to read the license from the environment variables and pass it to the page.
该函数会从环境变量中读取许可证并将其传递到前端页面。
The function tries to read the license from the environment variables and pass it to the page.
In the page, we can pass the license to the barcode scanner component to use it.
在页面中，我们可以将许可证传递给扫码组件以使用它。
In the page, we can pass the license to the barcode scanner component to use it.
If there is no licenses provided, use a one-day public trial.
如果没有提供许可证，使用一天有效期的试用证书。
If there is no licenses provided, use a one-day public trial.
